sentences.en: A no - till planter was designed that can work on the field bestrewing whole maize straw.
sentences.cn: 摘要设计了一种能够用于玉米收获后,秸秆直立状态下的免耕播种机.

sentences.en: After many setbacks and adventures on the sea, he settles down in Brazil as a planter.
sentences.cn: 在海上经历了一连串挫折与艰险, 他定居巴西成为种植园主.

sentences.en: And corn's planter and the rate of prediction downward revise.
sentences.cn: 其中玉米的种植和产量预测都向下修正.

sentences.en: He also distinguished himself as a planter in Kenya.
sentences.cn: 他也因是肯尼亚种植园主而闻名.

sentences.en: He was not of the planter class at all, though he was not poor white.
sentences.cn: 他尽管不是个穷白人,但根本不属于农场主阶级.

sentences.en: Houseware Tray, Container, Planter , Candle Holder, Tabletop, Photoframe Home Appliances.
sentences.cn: 采购产品家居用品盘子, 容器, 种植者, 蜡烛烛台, 桌面, 相框.

sentences.en: However, if tree dies, the planter may be called too dumb to keep a tree alive!
sentences.cn: 但若是种死了, 还会被骂无能,连一颗树也种不活!

sentences.en: ObjectiveTo measure cortical areas involved ankle dorsiflexion and planter flexion.
sentences.cn: 目的检测参与踝关节背屈和跖屈运动的脑区.

sentences.en: Planter - Put pebbles in the bottom of a small jar, then fill with potting soil.
sentences.cn: 花盆 - 在小玻璃瓶底铺上鹅卵石, 然后装满陶土.

sentences.en: Scuttle: Maybe you could make a little planter out of it or something.
sentences.cn: 斯卡托: 也许你可以用它来种点花草什么的.

sentences.en: She grabbed Baby's leg so he had to loosen his grip on the planter.
sentences.cn: 它抓住小鸟的一条腿,这样小鸟就可以不用那么紧地抓住播种机了.

sentences.en: That young man was the son of a wealthy planter.
sentences.cn: 那年轻人是一位富有的农场主的儿子.

sentences.en: The clerk said with his best southern planter's accent.
sentences.cn: 房间登记员以最地道的南部种植园主的口吻回答.

sentences.en: To all appearances he was just the commonplace planter who had fallen upon evil days.
sentences.cn: 表面上看来,他完全是个时运不济的普通种植园主.

words.tran_cn: 适用于种植园或热带、亚热带国家的
工厂，车间；植物；设备；庄稼
[农机]种植机，播种机；种植者；种植园主；耕作者；殖民者

trans.tran_cn: 种植园主，大农场主，种植者，播种机，殖民者，培植器皿，花架
trans.tran_en: someone who owns or is in charge of a plantation
